evidence: we can create color-coded images that reflect the molecular composition of the tissue or phantom.

triples.evidence: In conventional CT, the system typically uses an energy-integrating detector.

concepts.term: move beyond structural imaging into the possibility of functional and molecular imaging

evidence: With more advanced technology, we can use photon-counting detectors.
